name: Tap Ski Extreme
description:
Get the latest version on Google Play here:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fathoms.tapski

or from iTunes if you have an iPhone:

Paid Version or Free Version

***********************************************

Hit the slopes in this classic downhill skiing game

  • Choose from over a dozen characters
  • Intuitive controls! Tap left/right to move left/right
  • Inspired by the classic windows ski game, SkiFree
  • Random endless map for challenging action!

Tentatively titled "Flappy Angry Frozen Birds Hill Run With Friends," Tap Ski Extreme was developed by just me, including music and artwork =)
I hope you enjoy it!
Comments are appreciated

If you like the music, you can listen to it on soundcloud here:
https://soundcloud.com/fathoms-pixelcake-games/sets/tap-ski-extreme

HELP & SUPPORT

If you have any technical issues or questions, feel free to send us an email at whocanfathom@gmail.com
